overview:
Mottled Tan born on 19th Aug, 1992 in Mumbai, India has been into Blogging and Entrepreneurship since 2009.

Currently pursuing his education in CSA (Cyber Security Analyses), he is also the Chief of an IT Firm, Exam Mottled, based in Navi Mumbai. Known for his skills and creativity, he has been awarded many certifications like “Young Newton” for his Flood Management Project [Yr:2006 Ref. DNA Newspaper, Navi Mumbai], Ranked 1st position in All India United Nations Information Exam 2007, Awarded Youngest CEO of Navi Mumbai by Google, India (Yr.2010) for his successful firm Mottled Services engaged in Web Designing and Sales of Security Softwares. In late 2010, Mottled Services was dissolved to upbring a new venture called Exam Mottled, as it would have its own software developers and unlike Mottled Services won’t depend on the other giants in the industry. He has been always better at development of concept websites and a well know CSS Scriptor.

Mottled Tan has been also a member of International Council of CCLP Worldwide since September, 2009

On 26-November-2010, he also acquired the Intellectual Rights (Intellectual Property India) of his upcoming concept Politics Web Media

Apart from regular writing, he is based on day-to-day learning of new concepts and things. Management of Exam Mottled to its core level surrounds him. He is also involved in regular talks on interesting concepts with students, teachers and parents. Most of his seminars are based in schools regarding “Exam Preparation Strategies” and making Teaching a better art. He has involved into 2 years input for the development of Exam Mottled Conceptual Software a reality.
